title: How does Anna-Teresa Tymieniecka's phenomenology of life, 'ontopoiesis', build upon Husserl's 'lebenswelt'? - Quora

response.answer_text: OntoPoiesis: It is an added dimension of human (textual) experience. It is the relatively enlightened ability to add emotion to language and experience humanity. It is also sometimes a logical conclusion of analyzing itself. Sometimes it could be seen as a closing of the postmodern void.
